alert.note: Alert for Chaves; De Baca; Guadalupe; Lincoln (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 11 at 3:26PM MDT until September 11 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN...SOUTHWESTERN DE BACA...NORTHERN CHAVES AND SOUTHWESTERN GUADALUPE COUNTIES... At 326 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ramon, or 25 miles southeast of Vaughn, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ramon and Yeso. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 166 and 190. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 301 and 309. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
